text: Syhlovate (, ) — village (selo) in Turka Raion, Lviv Oblast, of Western Ukraine, deep in the Carpathians. The village is located high in the mountains, the average height — above sea level. The village is distant from the city of Lviv at , from Turka, and from Uzhhorod.DELLA Local government — Bitlianska village council.Bitlianska village council Residents of the village are engaged in agriculture and forestry. In the village there is a church the Transfiguration of our Lord Jesus Christ. Also, the village has a school, forestry, bakery, workshop for furniture. == History == The first mention of villages Syhlovate in historical documents refers to 1580.Turka district: map, photos == References == == External links == * Турківщина * Історія Бойківщини * Дерев'яні церкви Турківського району. title: Syhlovate
